name: Mutation
description: Operations to update data in the Twitch API.

fields.name: acceptFriendRequest
fields.description: acceptFriendRequest accepts a friend request from the target user to the authenticated user, creating a new Friend relationship.

fields.name: acceptProgramAgreement
fields.description: Accept program agreement during payout onboarding.

fields.name: activateExtension
fields.description: Activate an extension which has been installed on a channel.

fields.name: addBrowserPushSubscription
fields.description:
addBrowserPushSubscription adds a browser push subscription for receiving browser (desktop) push notifications.
The client must retrieve the input fields from the browser's push notification API. Client's will
call this when the user opts-in. A browser push subscription is tied to a user's browser (device).
Twitch will use these push subscriptions to send browser push notifications.

Spec: https://www.w3.org/TR/push-api/#push-subscription.

fields.name: addChannelBlockedTerm
fields.description: Adds a blocked term to a channel.

fields.name: addChannelPermittedTerm
fields.description: Adds a permitted term to a channel.

fields.name: addCollectionItem
fields.description: addCollectionItem adds an item to a collection.

fields.name: addReaction
fields.description: addReaction allows a user to create a reaction for any reactable item in a feed.

fields.name: allowRejectedChatMessage
fields.description: Allows a message rejected on a channel chat.

fields.name: applyExtensionActivations
fields.description:
Apply activation state to a subset of installed extensions. In order to deactivate an installed extension,
simply pass a null value in the anchor.

fields.name: banUserFromChatRoom
fields.description: Bans a user from chat room permanently or for an specified period of time.

fields.name: banUserFromCommunity
fields.description:
banUserFromCommunity allows a user to ban another user from a community
must be the community owner or a moderator.

fields.name: banVideoCommenter
fields.description: banVideoCommenter bans a user from commenting on a video.

fields.name: blockUser
fields.description: Blocks target user from communicating with the current user.

fields.name: cancelBounty
fields.description:
cancelBounty allows a user to cancel a claimed bounty.
If the user has not met the requirements to cancel the bounty, an error will be returned.

fields.name: cancelFriendRequest
fields.description: cancelFriendRequest destroys a friend request relationship from the authenticated user to the target user.

fields.name: cancelPayoutOnboardingWorkflow
fields.description: Cancel a current payout onboarding workflow.

fields.name: claimAllRewards
fields.description:
claimAllRewards allows the current user to claim all rewards for a given campaign domain (e.g. Overwatch League).
If the domain does not exist an error will be returned.

fields.name: claimBounty
fields.description:
claimBounty allows a user to claim a bounty from a campaign (e.g. Stream a Game Campaign).
If the user has not met the requirements to claim it, an error will be returned.

fields.name: claimMilestone
fields.description:
claimMilestone allows the current user to claim a milestone for a campaign (e.g. Overwatch League).
If the user has not met the requirements to claim it, or the milestone does not exist an error will be returned.

fields.name: claimPrimeOffer
fields.description: claimPrimeOffer allows a user to create their entitlement to the given offer/content.

fields.name: clearUnreadFriendRequests
fields.description: clearUnreadFriendRequests marks all friend requests for the authenticated user as read.

fields.name: createClip
fields.description: createClip creates a new clip with the authenticated user as the curator.

fields.name: createCollection
fields.description: createCollection creates a collection with a provided collection name.

fields.name: createCommunity
fields.description: createCommunity allows a user to create a community.

fields.name: createCommunityImageUploadURL
fields.description: createCommunityImageUploadURL creates and returns a url to use on the client side to upload media images.

fields.name: createDropImageUploadURL
fields.description: createDropImageUploadURL creates and returns a url to use on the client side to upload drops images.

fields.name: createFriendRequest
fields.description: createFriendRequest creates a friend request relationship between the authenticated user and the target user.

fields.name: createPanel
fields.description: createPanel removes a panel.

fields.name: createPost
fields.description: createPost creates a new post.

fields.name: createRoom
fields.description: Creates a new chatroom.

fields.name: createSegmentEvent
fields.description: createSegmentEvent allows a user to create a Segment type event.

fields.name: createSingleEvent
fields.description:
createSingleEvent allows a user to create a Single type event.  The Single type describes generic,
basic, self-contained events that only occur once.

fields.name: createTimetableEvent
fields.description: createTimetableEvent allows a user to create a Timetable type event.

fields.name: createVideoComment
fields.description: createVideoComment creates a video comment.

fields.name: createVideoHighlight
fields.description: createVideoHighlight creates a video of type Highlight from an Archive type video.

fields.name: deactivateExtension
fields.description: Deactivate an extension which has been installed on a channel.

fields.name: deleteChannelBlockedTerm
fields.description: Deletes a blocked term from a channel.

fields.name: deleteChannelPermittedTerm
fields.description: Deletes a permitted term from a channel.

fields.name: deleteClips
fields.description:
deleteClips allows a user to delete clips by slugs, video id, or broadcast id.
Only the slug and id can be accessed from the list of deleted clips.

fields.name: deleteCollection
fields.description: deleteCollection performs a delete on the collection with the provided ID.

fields.name: deleteEventCollection
fields.description: deleteEventCollection allows an authorized user to delete an event collection.

fields.name: deleteEventLeaf
fields.description: deleteEventLeaf allows an authorized user to delete an event leaf.

fields.name: deleteNotification
fields.description: deleteNotification deletes an onsite notification of the authenticated user.

fields.name: deletePanel
fields.description: deletePanel removes a panel.

fields.name: deletePost
fields.description: deletePost deletes a old post.

fields.name: deleteRoom
fields.description: Deletes a chatroom.

fields.name: deleteRoomMessage
fields.description: Deletes an existing message in a chatroom.

fields.name: deleteVideo
fields.description: deleteVideo performs a delete on the video with the provided ID.

fields.name: deleteVideo
fields.description: deleteVideo performs a delete on the video with the provided ID.

fields.name: deleteVideoComment
fields.description:
deleteVideoComment performs a delete on the video comment with the provided comment ID.
NOTE: this should use an input argument, not define the commentID right here.

fields.name: denyRejectedChatMessage
fields.description: Denies a message rejected on a channel chat.

fields.name: dismissFriendRecommendation
fields.description:
dismissFriendRecommendation removes a friend recommendation to the authenticated user without creating a friend
request.

fields.name: dismissPinnedCheer
fields.description: dismissPinnedCheer allows a moderator to remove a pinned recent message or reset the top pinned messages.

fields.name: dismissPurchaseToken
fields.description: dismissPurchaseToken allows the current user to dismiss a purchase token notification without sharing in chat.

fields.name: dismissRitualToken
fields.description: Permanently dismiss a ritual token without redeeming it.

fields.name: editCommunity
fields.description:
editCommunity allows a user to edit a community's settings
must be the community owner.

fields.name: editRoomMessage
fields.description: Edits an existing message in a chatroom.

fields.name: followCommunity
fields.description: followCommunity allows a user to follow a community.

fields.name: followDeprecatedEvent
fields.description: followDeprecatedEvent allows the currently authenticated user to follow an event.

fields.name: followEvent
fields.description: followEvent allows the currently authenticated user to follow an event.

fields.name: followGame
fields.description: followGame allows a user to follow a game.

fields.name: followUser
fields.description:
followUser creates a follow relationship between the authenticated user and
the target user.

fields.name: installExtension
fields.description: Install an extension onto a specific channel.

fields.name: joinChannelRooms
fields.description: Joins the channel's chatrooms.

fields.name: leaveChannelRooms
fields.description: Leaves the channel's chatrooms.

fields.name: linkSSO
fields.description: Link a single sign-on (SSO) app to a user's account.

fields.name: modUser
fields.description: Make a user a moderator for a channel.

fields.name: openCrate
fields.description:
openCrate allows an authenticated a user to open the specified Twitch Crate. The contents of the crate will be given
to the user as part of this action. The specified crate must be owned by the requesting user.
Otherwise, an error will be returned.

fields.name: orderPanels
fields.description:
orderPanels updates the sort order of the provided panels, the input must be a list of panel ids
all of which are owned by the acting user otherwise the request will fail and a generic GraphQL
error will be returned.

fields.name: publishClip
fields.description: publishClip allows a user to permanently edit and update their default clip, viewable to the public.

fields.name: readNotifications
fields.description: readNotifications sets the read state to true for one or more onsite notifications of the authenticated user.

fields.name: redeemRitualToken
fields.description:
Redeem an available ritual token. Currently, tokens are redeemed by sending
a special message to a channel's chat.

fields.name: redeemTrueXAd
fields.description:
redeemTrueXAd processes the result of watching an ad to earn bits.
This action can only be taken if an OAuth token is supplied with the request.

fields.name: registerPayoutInformation
fields.description: Register payout information during payout onboarding.

fields.name: rejectFriendRequest
fields.description: rejectFriendRequest destroys a friend request relationship from the target user to the authenticated user.

fields.name: removeCollectionItem
fields.description: removeCollectionItem removes an item from a collection.

fields.name: removeReaction
fields.description: removeReaction removes a reaction created with addReaction.

fields.name: reorderCollectionItem
fields.description: reorderCollectionItem reorders an item's position in a collection.

fields.name: reportContent
fields.description: reportContent allows a user to report content on the site as infringing of our terms of service.

fields.name: reportUserInCommunity
fields.description: reportUserInCommunity allows a user to report another user for violating a community's rules.

fields.name: reportVideoComment
fields.description: reportVideoComment reports a video comment identified by provided comment ID.

fields.name: reportWhisperThread
fields.description: Reports a whisper thread as spam.

fields.name: requestRitualToken
fields.description: Request a ritual token to be issued to the user.

fields.name: sendCheer
fields.description:
sendCheer sends a chat message that contains cheermotes. The message will
be processed, bits deducted from the authenticated user's balance, and then the
message will be passed on to the chat service (client shouldn't send the message itself).
This action can only be taken if an OAuth token is supplied with the request.

fields.name: sendRoomMessage
fields.description: Sends a message to a chatroom.

fields.name: sendWhisper
fields.description: Sends a whisper message to the target user.

fields.name: setAmendmentAcceptance
fields.description: setAmendmentAcceptance sets that the acting user has agreed to the given amendment type.

fields.name: setChannelFeedEnabled
fields.description: Set value for channel_feed_enabled.

fields.name: setChannelNotificationSetting
fields.description: setChannelNotificationSetting allows a user to set a notification setting.

fields.name: setDefaultPaymentMethod
fields.description:
Sets the default payment method for a user.
Currently supports the Zuora (credit card) and Recurly (credit card, Pay-with-Amazon, PayPal) payment providers
This is the final step of the payment method management flow. (User.paymentMethods -> User.paymentMethodConfigs -> this mutation).

fields.name: setNotificationSetting
fields.description: setNotificationSetting allows a user to set a notification setting.

fields.name: setPreferredLanguageTag
fields.description: Set a user's preferred language tag.

fields.name: setSessionStatus
fields.description:
setSessionStatus sets the user's status for this session, which influences how they appear ("online", "idle",
"watching SnarfyBobo") to friends and related users. To maintain a session status, setSessionStatus needs to be sent
periodically. The amount of time your application should wait between these status heartbeats is included in the
response payload.

fields.name: setUserResidence
fields.description: Set user's country of residence.

fields.name: sharePurchaseTokenInChat
fields.description: sharePurchaseTokenInChat allows the current user to share a purchase token in the chat with a message.

fields.name: spendSubscriptionCredit
fields.description: Spend Twitch Prime monthly subscription credit.

fields.name: startPayoutOnboardingWorkflow
fields.description: Start a new payout onboarding workflow.

fields.name: timeoutUserFromCommunity
fields.description:
timeoutUserFromCommunity allows a user to time out another user from a community
must be the community owner or a moderator.

fields.name: toggleRitualsEnabled
fields.description: toggleRitualsEnabled allows a user to toggle the rituals feature for their channel.

fields.name: tosBanCommunity
fields.description: tosBanCommunity allows a Twitch admin to tos-ban a community from the site.

fields.name: unbanUserFromChatRoom
fields.description: Removes a ban imposed on a user for an especified chat room.

fields.name: unbanUserFromCommunity
fields.description:
unbanUserFromCommunity allows a user to unban another user from a community
must be the community owner or a moderator.

fields.name: unblockUser
fields.description: Removes block from target user.

fields.name: unfollowCommunity
fields.description: unfollowCommunity allows a user to unfollow a community.

fields.name: unfollowDeprecatedEvent
fields.description: unfollowDeprecatedEvent allows the currently authenticated user to unfollow an event.

fields.name: unfollowEvent
fields.description: unfollowEvent allows the currently authenticated user to unfollow an event.

fields.name: unfollowGame
fields.description: unfollowGame allows a user to unfollow a game.

fields.name: unfollowUser
fields.description:
unfollowUser destroys the follow relationship between the authenticated user and
the target user.

fields.name: unfriendUser
fields.description: unfriendUser destroys a friend relationship from the target user to the authenticated user.

fields.name: uninstallExtension
fields.description: Uninstall an extension from a specific channel.

fields.name: unlinkSSO
fields.description: Unlink an SSO app from a user's account.

fields.name: unmodUser
fields.description: Remove moderator status from a user in a channel.

fields.name: unsubscribeEmail
fields.description: unsubscribeEmail unsubscribes a given user from a given email campaign.

fields.name: untimeoutUserFromCommunity
fields.description:
untimeoutUserFromCommunity allows a user to un-time out another user from a community
must be the community owner or a moderator.

fields.name: updateAllWhisperThreads
fields.description: Updates all of a user's whisper threads.

fields.name: updateAutoModProperties
fields.description: Set individual automod categories (i.e. set identity to level 3 but profanity to 0).

fields.name: updateBroadcastSettings
fields.description: updateBroadcastSettings allows the user to update their broadcast setting.

fields.name: updateChatColor
fields.description: Updates a user's chat color.

fields.name: updateChatSettings
fields.description: Set different chat settings (i.e. disable globalBannedWordsOptOut).

fields.name: updateCheerPartnerSettings
fields.description: Update the user's partner settings regarding bits.

fields.name: updateClip
fields.description: updateClip allows a user to update the metadata of a clip.

fields.name: updateClipViewCount
fields.description: updateClipViewCount allows a user to increment the viewcount of a clip.
fields.deprecationReason: Will eventually be replaced by different viewcounting method

fields.name: updateCollection
fields.description: updateCollection performs an update on the collection with the provided ID and updated attributes.

fields.name: updateEventBroadcastNotifications
fields.description:
updateEventBroadcastNotifications allows a user to update their notification settings for a given
EventBroadcast.

fields.name: updateIsSharingActivity
fields.description: Changes the user's activity sharing setting. A user's activity is one part of their status.

fields.name: updateOnboardingSkippedChannels
fields.description: updateOnboardingSkippedChannels updates skipped channel IDs during onboarding for a given user.

fields.name: updatePanel
fields.description: updatePanel updates the data for a given panel.

fields.name: updatePremiereEvent
fields.description: updatePremiereEvent allows a user to update a Premiere type event.

fields.name: updatePrimeSettings
fields.description:
updatePrimeSettings allows the user to enable or disable chat notifications when spending a Prime Credit,
and allows the user to set the type of Smilies (Turbos, Robots, or Monkeys) they want for Prime/Turbo Emoticons.

fields.name: updateRoom
fields.description: Updates an existing chatroom.

fields.name: updateRoomModes
fields.description: Updates the room modes (slow mode, emotes only mode, etc.) for the room.

fields.name: updateRoomView
fields.description: Update's a user's room view for a chatroom.

fields.name: updateSegmentEvent
fields.description: updateSegmentEvent allows a user to update a Segment type event.

fields.name: updateSingleEvent
fields.description: updateSingleEvent allows a user to update a Single type event.

fields.name: updateSubscriptionProduct
fields.description: updateSubscriptionProduct allows a user to update their subscription product settings.

fields.name: updateTimetableEvent
fields.description: updateTimetableEvent allows a user to update a Timetable type event.

fields.name: updateUserDirectoryHidden
fields.description: Set a user's directory hidden field.

fields.name: updateUserSubscriptionSettings
fields.description: updateUserSubscriptionSettings updates the subscription preferences for the authenticated user.

fields.name: updateVideoComment
fields.description: updateVideoComment updates a video comment identified by provided comment ID.

fields.name: updateVisibility
fields.description:
Changes the user's visibility setting. This is an account-level setting that will cause the user's availability to
appear differently to other users, despite what sessions are reporting. See the VisibilityInput enum for details on
the effects of each value.

Because this is an account-level setting, it should only be used in response to the user expressing clear intention
to change their visibility. Setting a status for an individual session should be done using setSessionStatus.

fields.name: updateWhisperThread
fields.description: Updates a whisper thread.

fields.name: viewedNotifications
fields.description: viewedNotifications updates when the authenticated user last saw onsite notifications.
